risks.title: COMMANDS_RUN.md non-determinism blocks cert chain
risks.description: epoch:mega:proof:x2 FAIL due to semantic fingerprint mismatch in COMMANDS_RUN.md between run1 and run2. This blocks epoch:foundation:seal and PROFIT_FOUNDATION_FREEZE_GATE.
risks.impact: CERT chain broken; no foundation seal; profit freeze gate gated
risks.fix: Exclude COMMANDS_RUN.md from semantic hash scope OR make it deterministic (strip timestamps/run_ids before hashing). Add regression gate.

risks.title: Victory seal blocked by offenders outside write roots
risks.description: 9 files outside allowed write roots exist as untracked/modified: includes scripts/, package.json, and logs. victory:seal precheck emits CHURN01.
risks.impact: Cannot close epoch victory; MERGE_SAFE blocked
risks.fix: MOVE scripts to commit or add to .gitignore if generated; COMMIT package.json changes; MOVE logs to allowed roots (artifacts/**); add offender-class regression.

risks.title: regression_no_unbounded_spawnsync gate artifact missing
risks.description: PROFIT_FOUNDATION_FREEZE_GATE requires reports/evidence/EXECUTOR/gates/manual/regression_no_unbounded_spawnsync.json which does not exist.
risks.impact: Freeze gate permanently NEEDS_DATA until artifact produced
risks.fix: Implement and run regression: verify:regression:no-unbounded-spawnsync. Write gate artifact to EXECUTOR/gates/manual/.

risks.title: edge:profit:02 steps exit ec=1 in DRY_RUN mode
risks.description: Four edge:profit:02 steps (expectancy-proof, pbo, risk, proof:index) fail with ec=1 in EDGE_PROFIT_DRY_RUN=1 mode. Anomalies recorded in NETKILL_LEDGER.
risks.impact: P2 MVP proof steps cannot be validated; profit lane B blocked
risks.fix: Diagnose edge:profit:02:expectancy-proof DRY_RUN failure; check for missing fixture data or DRY_RUN guard logic errors. Fix dry-run path.

risks.title: EDGE_PROFIT_00 stuck on stub — not promotion-eligible
risks.description: Active profile is FIXTURE_STUB. Real public market data not acquired (artifacts/incoming/real_public_market.jsonl missing). Cannot promote to real evidence without network unlock.
risks.impact: Profit epoch cannot close with real signal; only stub evidence
risks.fix: When network unlock authorized: run edge:profit:00:acquire:public with --enable-network + ALLOW_NETWORK file. Then re-run edge:profit:00 to generate REAL evidence.

risks.title: All P2 MVP signal/paper/micro-live gates PENDING — no data
risks.description: RG_SIG01, RG_SIG02, RG_PAPER01, RG_PAPER02, RG_LIVE01, RG_LIVE02 all PENDING. Liquidation lane has no acquired data (bybit_ws_v5 raw.jsonl missing).
risks.impact: P2 MVP cannot be evaluated until signal data acquired or fixture provided
risks.fix: Provide fixture or unlock network for liquidation data acquire. Run edge:liq:replay against fixtures. Generate features.jsonl + features.lock.json.

risks.title: Micro-live kill-switch matrix not configured
risks.description: ENABLE_MICROLIVE file absent. Kill-switch matrix and exposure degrade logic not verified. RG_LIVE01 must-fail gate never triggered.
risks.impact: Live trading safeguards unverified; cannot advance to micro-live without proper gate
risks.fix: Design kill-switch matrix; implement RG_LIVE01 must-fail test; verify determinism of kill-switch via RG_LIVE02 before any unlock.

risks.title: Evidence tree contains 100+ epoch directories — audit overhead
risks.description: reports/evidence/ contains E66-E142, EPOCH-01 through EPOCH-65 plus many named epochs. PR01 evidence bloat guard is PASS but tree size is large.
risks.impact: Slow verify:repo:byte-audit:x2; increased context overhead per run
risks.fix: Archive old epoch evidence to tar.gz with sha256 sidecar (like EPOCH-30-CLOSEOUT pattern). Run PR01 guard after. Add archive-on-close step to epoch closeout protocol.
